name: rains fall.
description:
This is 'rains fall.', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
The game takes place in an alternate universe where mankind has become extinct due to the Flood. It's a tale about a man whose faith is questioned still, and who becomes embroiled in a struggle that would determine the fate of the human race. Here's the current development schedule: 2017: One week created, developer Outhouse Media will begin production and publish the game, launching in 2017. February: Two weeks created, developer Outhouse Media will begin production and publish the game, launching in March. May: Three weeks created, developer Outhouse Media will begin production and release the game, launching in June. July: Entire development time spent on development. This period will include initial concept art, polishing of the game, coding, and QA. November: The entire development time spent on development. This period will include initial concept art, polishing of the game, coding, and QA. December: The entire development time spent on development. This period will include initial concept art, polishing of the game, coding, and QA. Here's the Artbook Ahead of this month's announcement, we've got the cover art from the game to share! You can see more art from throughout the development process in the following gallery. Download the Artbook We're happy to announce that you can now download the Outhouse Media Art
